name: Multi-Entity Relationship Validation Chain

steps.name: Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"
Given I execute API request "get_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 200
When I execute API request "get_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 200
And the response should be an array with length greater than 0
When I execute API request "get_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 200
And the response should be an array
When I execute API request "post_api" with parameters
Then the response status should be 201
And the response field "postId" should equal the second-to-last response array first element field "id"

fullName: Complex Integration Testing with Multi-Step Data Validation: Multi-Entity Relationship Validation Chain

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Complex Integration Testing with Multi-Step Data Validation
